chunk:
Joy Works Beauty Calming Face Mask

Brand: Joy Works

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Dimethicone, *Inulin, Rubus Chamaemorus Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Niacinamide, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Carbomer, Aminomethyl Propanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Allantoin (*Contains Preb

toin (*Contains Prebiotic)

Directions: Apply a thin layer of Calming Face Mask on clean dry skin. Wait 10-15 minutes and then wash off with water. Avoid eye area.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
